::KitKat::

"Hey, I got an idea. Who here has the best hearing? Put your ear to 
the wall.  See if you can hear me through his commlink.  That is 
assuming it's working. Maybe one of us can hear it through the wall. 
Terrorsaur, turn up your scanner, it may pick him up while his 
commlink is open."  She yelled into her commlink.
"COMMANDER QUICKSTRIKE!! DO YOU READ ME?!"  She turned up the volume 
on her link as high as it would go so it would come in louder on 
Quickstrike's end.  She hoped he had his commlink open.  She pressed 
her ear to the wall and called out again on her link."CAN YOU HEAR ME 
COMMANDER?"


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Talon Harvilicz" <wilddance_mare@h...> 
wrote:
> Terrorsaur:
> 
> 
> Terrorsaur stopped, taking a moment to check his scanners. Rowdy 
Wolf nearly 
> bumped into his back-side. He turned a glance at him, then went 
back to his 
> scanners. He frowned, trying to figure them out.
> 
> I...I don't know where he is." he said. "My scanner's are going hay-
wire." 
> He shook his head. "But, I think we're near-by." He said to Drill-
bit: "Just 
> keep going, we should hit an entrance."
>
